lines.gurmukhi: Aibigiq giq kq Awvq AMqir giq; AkQ kQw su kih kYsy kY sunweIAY [

Unknown.translation: How can the mysteries of the eternal Lord be brought into mind? He cannot be described. How can He be explained through words?

lines.gurmukhi: AlK Apwr ikDO pweIAiq pwr kYsy; drsu Adrsu ko kYsy kY idKweIAY [

Unknown.translation: How can we reach the beyond end of the infinite Lord? How can the invisible Lord be shown?

lines.gurmukhi: Agm Agocru Aghu ghIAY DO kYsy; inrlMbu kaun AvlMb TihrweIAY [

Unknown.translation: The Lord who is beyond the reach of the senses and perception, how can the Lord who cannot be caught be held and known? The Lord Master needs no support. Who can be assigned as His support?

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK sMiD imlY soeI jwnY jw mY bIqY; ibsm ibdyh jl bUMd huie smweIAY [253[
